<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP-TV%253A%2BSquadcast%2Bwith%2BRowsdower%2B%2526%2BThe_Lolbster&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=505296949"></object></p>

<p>During last week’s <strong>Squadcast</strong>,<strong> Maxmaps</strong> and <strong>Yargnit</strong> had to exit at the last minute, handing <strong>Rowsdower</strong> and <strong>the_lolbster</strong> the keys to the kingdom. What happened when two people with no notice and no news decided to carry on with the show? <strong>Twitch. Plays. KSP</strong>.</p>
Twitch plays KSP? I don't understand. The video is only an "offline"
How about you guys fast forward a few minutes?
